markets.title: Will the group switch venue after an initial venue lock?
markets.description: Tracks the recurring lock-then-pivot behavior in the newest planning threads.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves YES if the final meetup venue is different from the first clearly locked venue in the same thread.

markets.title: Will reservation size be increased again before meetup start?
markets.description: High-signal logistics behavior: adding seats and expanding tables.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves YES if messages include expanding reservation/adding chairs before start time.

markets.title: Will a Givatayim carpool post fill all announced seats?
markets.description: Transport coordination market based on explicit car seat offers.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves YES if a ride offer from Givatayim is posted and all seats are explicitly claimed.

markets.title: Will a WhatsApp poll be used to decide the next plan?
markets.description: Decision-mode market for when coordination stalls.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves YES if a poll is posted for location/time/attendance decision in the next plan cycle.

markets.title: Will final meetup time drift later than first suggested time?
markets.description: Time-drift pattern from 21:30 to 22:00/22:30 negotiations.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves YES if final start time is later than first explicit start time in thread.

markets.title: Will there be a same-night main plan + after-party split?
markets.description: Creative two-stage flow market grounded in recent behavior.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves YES if chat locks a main meetup and explicitly plans a second after-party for the same night.

markets.title: How many explicit confirmations by 20:00 on meetup day?
markets.description: Measures early commitment before logistics acceleration.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves to bucket by number of unique explicit confirmations by 20:00 local time.

markets.title: How many movement updates ("×‘×“×¨×š/×™×¦××ª×™/×× ×™ ×¤×”") in the final hour?
markets.description: Last-mile movement chatter intensity market.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves to bucket by number of movement/arrival updates in final 60 minutes.

markets.title: How many distinct venue options will be debated before lock?
markets.description: Decision complexity around location selection.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves to bucket by count of distinct venue candidates discussed before final lock.

markets.title: Which area will host the next main meetup?
markets.description: Area-level outcome market based on newest location arguments.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves to the area of final announced venue in the next main meetup thread.

markets.title: Who will post the final lock-in message (time + place)?
markets.description: Endgame ownership market among top planners.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves to the person who posts the final unambiguous lock-in message for next main meetup.

markets.title: What final start-time bucket will be locked?
markets.description: Start-time showdown from recurring late-evening negotiations.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves to final agreed start-time bucket in next main meetup thread.

markets.title: Will weather/wind concerns trigger a plan adjustment?
markets.description: Environmental factor market based on observed wind discussion.
markets.resolution_criteria: Resolves YES if weather/wind concern message causes a location/time adjustment in next plan cycle.

meta.focus: full reset: 55 markets, newest-first evidence, person-by-person + couples + group logistics
